definition[0]: a place that is connected with a holy event or holy person, and that people visit to pray
example[0]: his pilgrimage to the shrine of St John
definition[1]: a place that people visit and respect because it is connected with a famous person or event

example[2]: The museum is a shrine to the great Spanish artist.
